TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit FileSystemInfo extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class FileSystemInfo Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements ISerializable
public ref class FileSystemInfo abstract : MarshalByRefObject, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 為 和 物件提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for both and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含檔案和目錄管理通用的方法。The class contains methods that are common to file and directory manipulation. A物件可代表檔案或目錄，因此服務做為基礎或物件。A object can represent either a file or a directory, thus serving as the basis for or objects. 剖析許多檔案和目錄時，請使用這個基底類別。Use this base class when parsing a lot of files and directories. 在衍生的類別可以繼承自只有當在衍生的類別具有 AllAccess 權限從列舉型別。A derived class can inherit from only if the derived class has the AllAccess permission from the enumeration. 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考到檔案或只是目錄。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何重複使用所有的檔案和目錄，查詢每個項目的一些資訊。The following example shows how to loop through all the files and directories, querying some information about each entry. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IO::FileAttributes Attributes { System::IO::FileAttributes get(); void set(System::IO::FileAttributes value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前檔案或目錄的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes for the current file or directory.
of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值預先快取，如果屬性為目前的執行個體物件已從下列任何一個傳回方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 值可以是快取時的值本身或其他屬性存取。The value may be cached when either the value itself or other properties are accessed. 若要取得最新的值，呼叫方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果路徑不存在為準，最後一個快取的狀態，則傳回值是`(FileAttributes)(-1)`。If the path doesn't exist as of the last cached state, the return value is `(FileAttributes)(-1)`. 或可能只會擲回時設定的值。 or can only be thrown when setting the value. 這個屬性的值是 archive、 compressed、 目錄、 隱藏、 離線、 唯讀、 系統和暫存檔案的屬性旗標的組合。The value of this property is a combination of the archive, compressed, directory, hidden, offline, read-only, system, and temporary file attribute flags. 當您設定此值時，則使用位元 OR 運算子 (`|`在 C# 或`Or`在 Visual Basic 中) 以套用多個值。When you set this value, use the bitwise OR operator (`|` in C# or `Or` in Visual Basic) to apply more than one value. 若要保留任何現有的值在 屬性中包含的值您指派中的屬性。To retain any existing values in the property, include the value of the property in your assignment. 例如: For example: `exampleFile.Attributes = exampleFile.Attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly;` ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

exception.span: 只在設定屬性 (property) 值時擲回。

span.span: Only thrown when setting the property value.

-or-

for writing files and directories.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime CreationTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前檔案或目錄的建立時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the creation time of the current file or directory.

value.span: 目前 物件的建立日期和時間。

span.span: The creation date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值預先快取，如果屬性為目前的執行個體物件已從下列任何一個傳回方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要取得最新的值，呼叫方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果檔案中所述物件不存在，這個屬性會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 不支援建立或生日時間的 Unix 平台，這個屬性會傳回較舊的最後一個狀態變更的時間與上次修改時間。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 在其他平台，它會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案中繼資訊，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 這個程序稱為檔案通道。This process is known as file tunneling. 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the creation time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), of the current file or directory.

value.span: 目前 物件以 UTC 格式表示的建立日期和時間。

span.span: The creation date and time in UTC format of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值預先快取，如果屬性為目前的執行個體物件已從下列任何一個傳回方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要取得最新的值，呼叫方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果檔案中所述物件不存在，這個屬性會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 不支援建立或生日時間的 Unix 平台，這個屬性會傳回較舊的最後一個狀態變更的時間與上次修改時間。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 在其他平台，它會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案中繼資訊，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 這個程序稱為檔案通道。This process is known as file tunneling. 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Extension As String
public: property System::String ^ Extension { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，代表檔案的副檔名部分。

span.span: Gets the string representing the extension part of the file.
A string containing the extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Extension`屬性會傳回擴充功能，包括句號 （.）。The `Extension` property returns the extension, including the period (.). 例如，對於檔案 c:\NewFile.txt，這個屬性會傳回".txt"。For example, for a file c:\NewFile.txt, this property returns ".txt". 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |擷取檔案的完整的路徑。Retrieve the fully qualified path of a file.|| |僅擷取檔案名稱路徑。Retrieve only the file name a path.|| |從路徑擷取目錄名稱。Retrieve only the directory name from a path.|| |變更檔案的副檔名。Change the extension of a file.||

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果檔案中所述物件不存在，這個屬性會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 值預先快取，如果屬性為目前的執行個體物件已從下列任何一個傳回方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要取得最新的值，呼叫方法。To get the latest value, call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何更新透過 「 觸控 」 作業的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此範例中，檔案 「 接觸到 「，更新，和屬性目前的日期和時間。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/cs/touch.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/vb/touch.vb#00)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目前檔案或目錄上次被存取的時間，其格式為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the current file or directory was last accessed.

value.span: 目前檔案或目錄上次被存取的 UTC 時間。

span.span: The UTC time that the current file or directory was last accessed.

(C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定上次寫入目前檔案或目錄的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time when the current file or directory was last written to.

value.span: 上次寫入目前檔案的時間。

span.span: The time the current file was last written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值預先快取，如果屬性為目前的執行個體物件已從下列任何一個傳回方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要取得最新的值，呼叫方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果檔案或目錄中所述物件不存在，或如果包含此檔案或目錄的檔案系統不支援這項資訊，此屬性會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1If the file or directory described in the object does not exist, or if the file system that contains this file or directory does not support this information, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何更新透過 「 觸控 」 作業的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此範例中，檔案 「 接觸到 「，更新，和屬性目前的日期和時間。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 對於檔案，取得檔案的名稱。

span.span: For files, gets the name of the file.

summary.span: 對於目錄，如果有階層架構，則是取得階層架構中最後一個目錄的名稱。

span.span: For directories, gets the name of the last directory in the hierarchy if a hierarchy exists.

summary.span: 否則， 屬性會取得目錄的名稱。

span.span: Otherwise, the property gets the name of the directory.

value.span: 字串，可以是父代 (Parent) 目錄的名稱、階層架構中最後一個目錄的名稱，或者包括副檔名在內的檔案名稱。

span.span: A string that is the name of the parent directory, the name of the last directory in the hierarchy, or the name of a file, including the file name extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於目錄而言`Name`傳回父代目錄，例如 Dir，不 c:\Dir 的名稱。For a directory, `Name` returns only the name of the parent directory, such as Dir, not c:\Dir. 子目錄，`Name`傳回子目錄，例如 Sub1，不 c:\Dir\Sub1 的名稱。For a subdirectory, `Name` returns only the name of the subdirectory, such as Sub1, not c:\Dir\Sub1. 對於檔案，`Name`傳回僅檔案名稱和副檔名，例如 MyFile.txt，不 c:\Dir\Myfile.txt。For a file, `Name` returns only the file name and file name extension, such as MyFile.txt, not c:\Dir\Myfile.txt.

summary.span: 使用者指定的相對或絕對的原始路徑。

span.span: The path originally specified by the user, whether relative or absolute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 重新整理物件的狀態。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileSystemInfo.Refresh` 從目前的檔案系統檔案的快照。`FileSystemInfo.Refresh` takes a snapshot of the file from the current file system. `Refresh` 無法更正的基礎檔案系統，即使檔案系統會傳回不正確或過時的資訊。`Refresh` cannot correct the underlying file system even if the file system returns incorrect or outdated information. 這種情形等 Windows 98 平台上。This can happen on platforms such as Windows 98. 必須發出呼叫`Refresh`之前嘗試取得屬性資訊或資訊可能會過期。Calls must be made to `Refresh` before attempting to get the attribute information, or the information will be outdated.

exception.span: 裝置 (例如，磁碟機) 未就緒。

span.span: A device such as a disk drive is not ready.
